definitions.definition: Having a feeling of anxiety or disquietude; extremely concerned, especially about something that will happen in the future or that is unknown.
definitions.example: I could tell she was anxious as she was biting her nails.

definitions.definition: (of things) Accompanied with, or causing, anxiety; worrying.
definitions.example: There was an anxious wait before the results were revealed.
All the voters were anxious to hear the election result.
